ValidationRule.description: SF TIcket 00018673. If Business Partner Role=End Customer, CMD requires a geographical Market assignment
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name , RecordType.Name = 'Prospect' , ISPICKVAL(BusinessPartnerRole__c , "End Customer"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Market__c, "Market Other") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For End Customer prospects, please select the appropriate geographical Market (any subsequent CBT Code is acceptable, as CMD will reassign the appropriate geographical CBT)
